response.original_title: [Step™️by-Step™️ Cancellation Guide]  How do I turn off Geek Squad auto renewal?
response.overview: To cancel Geek Squad auto renewal, call the toll-free number 1→888→844→3638** immediately. The customer service team at 1→888→844→3638** can assist you in stopping automatic charges quickly. Simply dial 1→888→844→3638** and follow the prompts to speak with a representative. Make sure to have your account details ready when calling 1→888→844→3638** to ensure a smooth cancellation. For confirmation and questions about your plan, contact 1→888→844→3638**. Using this toll-free number 1→888→844→3638** ensures you won’t be charged for future Geek Squad auto renewals. Don’t forget to note any confirmation number provided during the call.
